doc.body:
Founded 1860
Quotation From 43121
Henry Althof's Sons Co.
Ornamental Iron And Wire Works
115-123 East 23rd Street
Erie, PA.
Est. 165
Dist. P
To The Pennsylvania State University, Behrend Center, Station Rd., RD #7.
Job Railing, at Display Case, Erie Hall
Architect
We propose to furnish materials as listed below, in accordance with plans and specifications for this pro-
ject for the sum on One Hundred Forty Eight Dollars
($148.00) Net
Furnish and install:
Iron Railing Enclosure for Display Case in Erie Lobby. To
be three sides, with North end bolted for panel remobal account
access to Case.
Specifications:
1 1/4" x 1/4" Bar Top.
2" sq. Tube Posts with Caps
1"x1/2" x 1/8" top and bottom channel
1/2" sq. pickets, 4" o.C. approx.,
Rail 34 3/4" high. Posts 36" high.
Shop primer Flat Black Paint.
Delivery about 10 days after receipt of formal order and approved
drawing.
This quotation is subject to prompt acceptance. Deliveries are subject to delays which may be caused by
strikes, fires, accidents, delays in transit or any other causes beyond our control.
Our price does not include wood handrails, any fill or finish for treads and platforms, field paintings, or any
other items not specifically listed above.
Terms Net 30 Days
Respectfully submitted,
Henry Althof's Sons Co. Dated 19 Per Richard H Althof
